overview: Hilary Duff's No. 1 smash hit album "Metamorphosis" is now joined by a DVD packed full of videos, behind-the-scenes footage, interviews, live clips and a whole lot more! A fantastic treat for her millions of fans across the globe, this "all access" disc gives you the VIP treatment. Join Hilary as she continues to make a successful transformation from actress to hugely popular singer -- a true feat in show business!
title: All Access Pass
